rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the impact of Covid-19 on university students and staff, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions about tuition fees:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Suspending payments for rent or ending a tenancy early is a matter for individual landlords, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
